intro.text: The wagon rocks as it rolls down the forest path. You've been hired to escort these supplies to Phandalin. The woods are silentâ€”too silent. Ahead, you see two dead horses blocking the path.

choices.label: Get out and investigate the horses.
Stay in the wagon and shout.

ambush_spotted.text: As you approach, you notice the arrows sticking out of the horses. Black fletching. Goblin make. You spin around just in time to see movement in the bushes!

ambush_surprise.text: Suddenly, arrows fly from the thicket! You are caught completely off guard as goblins shriek and charge.

victory_node.text: You stand victorious over the fallen goblins. The path is clear.

defeat_node.text: The world fades to black as you fall...
